- ğŸ› **Report bugs** by opening an issue
- ğŸ’¡ **Suggest features** or improvements

## ğŸ”„ Automatic Updates  

This contributors list is automatically updated during each release using semantic-release and the GitHub Contributors API. The data refreshes when:

- New contributors make their first merged contribution
- Release workflow runs (semantic-release process)
- Contributor commit counts change significantly
